title: Bibliometric Analysis Workshop for Emergency Remote Teaching (ERT) (Large-Scale)

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental educational technology knowledge, understanding of research methodologies, and science education experience
context.additional_context: Practical course for science teachers and pre-service teachers analyzing ERT research trends using bibliometric methods. Includes VOSviewer software application and PRISMA framework-based data collection exercises

learning_goals: Learners will systematically map ERT research trends using bibliometric analysis tools.
Learners will visualize keyword/author collaboration networks using VOSviewer software.
Learners will design an ERT research data collection process by applying the PRISMA framework.
Learners will analyze ERT research trends in science education by country/institution/topic.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
